backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining products, carts, orders, loyalty points, redemptions, and user profiles with access control and admin/user-protected methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme definitions using warm OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing setup using TanStack Router to define all application routes within the AppShell layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Component restricting access to admin-only content with loading and denied states.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Gatekeeper component requiring user authentication and showing login prompt if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Simple login button triggering Internet Identity authentication with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter a name and complete profile setup.
frontend/src/components/layout/AccountSu: Shows a dropdown with user info, points, navigation links, and handles logout via Internet Identity.
Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, authentication UI, and footer structure.
frontend/src/components/SupportWhatsAppL: Button linking to WhatsApp support chat with a prefilled message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refetching queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides queries and mutations for cart operations including fetching, adding, removing items, and placing orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides product-related queries and mutations for fetching, creating, updating, and toggling products.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains user and admin queries including profile, points, admin status, and point redemption.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin interface to list, create, edit, and activate/deactivate products using product CRUD hooks and a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items merged with product data, allows quantity updates and removal, and shows total cost and points.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows active products with search and category filters, loading skeletons, and a styled catalog layout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Shows the final cart summary and triggers order placement, handling loading states and empty-cart cases.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Static confirmation screen shown after placing an order with navigation options to shop or view rewards.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Placeholder page for order history behind auth, showing alerts and a temporary message.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Shows a product’s full details with image carousel, stock/quantity controls, and add‑to‑cart logic with auth check.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsPage.tsx: React page showing the user's points balance and enabling redemption of cashback or a mystery box when reaching 20 points.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the e-commerce app’s goals, features, requirements, images, and current build state.
